\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 52966}

\subsection*{Sick as a Dog}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Wharfrat}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 6 in & oral & Calamus & roots\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 170.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I thought I would try to eat some Calamus after noting that my favorite poet, Walt Whitman, entitled a section of poems `Calamus.'



Bad idea. I read some experiences online but decided to try it anyway, thinking I had a strong stomach. Bad idea. Bad idea.



My goodness! I have been vomiting for 6 hours now and cannot sleep. 



I feel like checking myself into some sick mental health clinic. What the \&^\$\%\$ was I thinking!

\end{document}
